messages.content:
You are an operations-grade construction field report analyst for RK Reporting.

Input Speech may be English, Spanish, or mixed. Output ONLY valid JSON (no markdown, no commentary) with these keys:

- Detected_Language: "en" | "es" | "mixed" | "unknown"
- Transcript_Original: string  (keep what was said; keep Spanish as Spanish; minimal cleanup only)
- Transcript_EN: string        (translate/normalize into clear professional English; if already English, rewrite cleanly)
- Summary_EN: string          (ONE sentence, English; action + location + status)
- Severity_Detected: "Basic" | "Urgent" | "Emergency" | "unknown"
- Emergency_Flag: boolean     (true ONLY if Severity_Detected = "Emergency")
- Confidence: number          (0 to 1; best estimate)
- Completeness: "Reported" | "Insufficient" | "unknown"
- Category_Detected: "Mechanical" | "General" | "unknown"

Completeness rules:
- Insufficient if the report is generic with no concrete jobsite progress + location context (e.g., "working", "laborando", "still here", "todo bien") and lacks details.
- Insufficient if transcript is very short, unclear, or missing key facts needed for office action.

Category rules:
- Mechanical if mentions truck/van, engine, brakes, tires, tow/towing, flat tire, no start, overheating, etc.
- Otherwise General.

Backwards-compatibility (ALSO include these keys, matching the new ones):
- Transcription: same as Transcript_EN
- Summary: same as Summary_EN
- Severity: same as Severity_Detected

Severity rules:
- Emergency: injury/accident, active fire/smoke, collapse/structural failure, active leak/flooding, gas hazard, immediate life-safety risk.
- Urgent: same-day operational risk (materials missing to continue, major access/access denial, severe weather exposure, customer escalation on-site, equipment failure) but not life-safety.
- Basic: routine progress/update or general note.

Return JSON only.

Input Speech: {{1.SpeechResult}}
Input Language: {{1.Language}}

select.label: Create a Chat Completion (GPT and o1 models)

nested.help: Text content of the message on behalf of the selected __Role__.
nested.name: content
nested.label: Text Content

nested.help:
Make sure to use a publicly accessible URL.
You can test if your image is publicly accessible by opening the link in an incognito tab.
nested.name: imageUrl
nested.label: Image URL

nested.help: Text content of the message on behalf of the selected __Role__.
nested.name: content
nested.label: Text Content

spec.help: Map this directly from the output of a previous **Create a Completion** module. Look for `Choices[]: Message.Tool Calls[]: ID`.
spec.name: id
spec.label: Tool call ID

spec.help: The name of the function previously called.
spec.name: name
spec.label: Name

spec.help: The arguments previously output by the AI.
spec.name: arguments
spec.label: Arguments

mappable.help: You can map the entire `Choices[]: Message.Tool Calls` array from a previous Create a Completion module here.

nested.help: Text content of the message on behalf of the selected __Role__.
nested.name: content
nested.label: Text Content

nested.help: The return of the function. This role should only be used when you have processed a previous function call and want to send the output of the function execution back to the AI.
nested.name: content
nested.label: Text Content

nested.help: Map this directly from the output of a previous **Create a Completion** module. Look for `Choices[]: Message.Tool Calls[]: ID`.
nested.name: tool_call_id
nested.label: Tool Call ID.

designer.name: Check Manifest (Next Pending = Blank or Insufficient)

mapper.body:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<Response>
  <Say voice="Polly.Matthew" language="en-US">Thank you. Your report has been logged. No other sites are currently pending. Goodbye.</Say>
  <Hangup/>
</Response>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<Response>
  <Say voice="Polly.Matthew" language="en-US">Thank you. We will now connect you to submit the report for your next site.</Say>
  <Redirect method="POST">https://hook.us2.make.com/udlc838rcz6yavklaawpli48cft159jo?Mode=redial&From={{encodeURL(1.From)}}&To={{encodeURL(1.To)}}&CallSid={{encodeURL(1.CallSid)}}&AccountSid={{encodeURL(ifempty(1.AccountSid; ""))}}&CallStatus={{encodeURL(ifempty(1.CallStatus; ""))}}&Direction={{encodeURL(ifempty(1.Direction; ""))}}&FromCity={{encodeURL(ifempty(1.FromCity; ""))}}&FromState={{encodeURL(ifempty(1.FromState; ""))}}&FromZip={{encodeURL(ifempty(1.FromZip; ""))}}&FromCountry={{encodeURL(ifempty(1.FromCountry; ""))}}&ToCity={{encodeURL(ifempty(1.ToCity; ""))}}&ToState={{encodeURL(ifempty(1.ToState; ""))}}&ToZip={{encodeURL(ifempty(1.ToZip; ""))}}&ToCountry={{encodeURL(ifempty(1.ToCountry; ""))}}&CallerName={{encodeURL(ifempty(1.CallerName; ""))}}&Digits={{encodeURL(ifempty(1.Digits; ""))}}&WorkerID={{encodeURL(ifempty(1.WorkerID; ""))}}&SiteRow={{encodeURL(8.`__ROW_NUMBER__`)}}&Language={{encodeURL(ifempty(1.Language; "en-US"))}}&CallLogID={{encodeURL(ifempty(1.CallLogID; ""))}}&ReportType={{encodeURL(ifempty(1.ReportType; ""))}}&Severity={{encodeURL(ifempty(1.Severity; ""))}}</Redirect>
</Response>
